name: Ting-Lu
flavorText: The fear poured into an ancient ritual vessel has clad itself in rocks and dirt to become a Pokémon.

previous.name: Chien-Pao
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon can control 100 tons of fallen snow. It plays around innocently by leaping in and out of avalanches it has caused.

next.name: Chi-Yu
next.flavorText: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.

pokemon.name: Ting-Lu
pokemon.flavorText: The fear poured into an ancient ritual vessel has clad itself in rocks and dirt to become a Pokémon.
